physical_examinations.relevant_findings: Coxa valga in both hips; flexion contracture of both knees with no mobility of quadriceps mechanism; shortened left leg with palpable bony protuberance in medial thigh proximal to knee joint; absence of patella; shortened right leg with palpable fibula lateral to knee; absent tibia; severe knee varus deformity bilaterally; equinovarus deformity of both feet; ectrodactyly of hallux on right foot, hallux and 2nd toe on left foot.
